trans-unit.source: Encapsulates a metadata property to be included in an image file.
trans-unit.target: 封装要将图像文件中包含的元数据属性。

trans-unit.source: Not inheritable.
trans-unit.target: 不可继承。

trans-unit.source: The data consists of: an identifier, the length (in bytes) of the property, the property type, and a pointer to the property value.
trans-unit.target: 数据组成︰ 标识符、 属性、 属性类型和指向的属性值的长度 （以字节为单位）。

trans-unit.source: A PropertyItem is not intended to be used as a stand-alone object.
trans-unit.target: PropertyItem 不用作独立的对象。

trans-unit.source: A PropertyItem object is intended to be used by classes that are derived from <xref:System.Drawing.Image>.
trans-unit.target: PropertyItem 对象旨在由从<xref:System.Drawing.Image>.</xref:System.Drawing.Image>派生的类一起使用

trans-unit.source: A PropertyItem object is used to retrieve and to change the metadata of existing image files, not to create the metadata.
trans-unit.target: PropertyItem 对象用于检索并更改现有图像文件，无法创建元数据的元数据。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, the PropertyItem class does not have a defined `Public` constructor, and you cannot create an instance of a PropertyItem object.
trans-unit.target: 因此，PropertyItem 类没有定义`Public`构造函数，并且你无法创建 PropertyItem 对象的实例。

trans-unit.source: To work around the absence of a `Public` constructor, use an existing PropertyItem object instead of creating a new instance of the PropertyItem class.
trans-unit.target: 若要解决缺少`Public`构造函数中，使用现有 PropertyItem 对象改为创建 PropertyItem 的新实例的类。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Drawing.Image.GetPropertyItem%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Drawing.Image.GetPropertyItem%2A?displayProperty=fullName>。</xref:System.Drawing.Image.GetPropertyItem%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the ID of the property.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置属性的 ID。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the property tags and their IDs.
trans-unit.target: 下表显示属性标记和及其 Id。

trans-unit.source: For more information about property tags, see [Image Property Tag Constants](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=145387).
trans-unit.target: 有关属性标记的详细信息，请参阅[映像属性标记常量](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=145387)。

trans-unit.source: For a description of each property tag, see [Property Item Descriptions](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=145383).
trans-unit.target: 有关每个属性标记的说明，请参阅[属性项说明](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=145383)。

trans-unit.source: The integer that represents the ID of the property.
trans-unit.target: 表示的属性 ID 的整数。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the length (in bytes) of the <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.PropertyItem.Value*> property.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置的长度 （以字节为单位）<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.PropertyItem.Value*>属性。</xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.PropertyItem.Value*>

trans-unit.source: An integer that represents the length (in bytes) of the <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.PropertyItem.Value*> byte array.
trans-unit.target: 一个整数，表示的长度 （以字节为单位）<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.PropertyItem.Value*>字节数组。</xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.PropertyItem.Value*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets an integer that defines the type of data contained in the <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.PropertyItem.Value*> property.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个整数，定义中包含的数据类型<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.PropertyItem.Value*>属性。</xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.PropertyItem.Value*>

trans-unit.source: The following table shows integers and the types they represent.
trans-unit.target: 下表显示整数和它们所表示的类型。

trans-unit.source: |Integer|Represented Type| |-------------|----------------------| |1|Specifies that <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.PropertyItem.Value%2A> is an array of bytes.| |2|Specifies that <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.PropertyItem.Value%2A> is a null-terminated ASCII string.
trans-unit.target: |整数 |表示类型 | |-------------|----------------------| |&1; |指定该<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.PropertyItem.Value%2A>是字节数组。 | |&2; |指定<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.PropertyItem.Value%2A>是以 null 结尾的 ASCII 字符串。</xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.PropertyItem.Value%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.PropertyItem.Value%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you set the type data member to ASCII type, you should set the <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.PropertyItem.Len%2A> property to the length of the string including the null terminator.
trans-unit.target: 如果类型数据成员设置为 ASCII 类型时，应设置<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.PropertyItem.Len%2A>属性包括 null 终止符的字符串的长度。</xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.PropertyItem.Len%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, the string "Hello" would have a length of 6.| |3|Specifies that <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.PropertyItem.Value%2A> is an array of unsigned short (16-bit) integers.| |4|Specifies that <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.PropertyItem.Value%2A> is an array of unsigned long (32-bit) integers.| |5|Specifies that <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.PropertyItem.Value%2A> data member is an array of pairs of unsigned long integers.
trans-unit.target: 例如，字符串"Hello"将具有的长度为 6。 | | 3 |指定该<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.PropertyItem.Value%2A>是无符号短 （16 位） 整数的数组。 | | 4 |指定该<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.PropertyItem.Value%2A>是数组的无符号长时间 （32 位） 整数。 | | 5 |指定<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.PropertyItem.Value%2A>数据成员是对无符号长整数的数组。</xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.PropertyItem.Value%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.PropertyItem.Value%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.PropertyItem.Value%2A>

trans-unit.source: Each pair represents a fraction; the first integer is the numerator and the second integer is the denominator.| |6|Specifies that <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.PropertyItem.Value%2A> is an array of bytes that can hold values of any data type.| |7|Specifies that <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.PropertyItem.Value%2A> is an array of signed long (32-bit) integers.| |10|Specifies that <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.PropertyItem.Value%2A> is an array of pairs of signed long integers.
trans-unit.target: 每个对表示的小数部分;第一个整数为分子，第二个整数为分母。 | |&6; |指定该<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.PropertyItem.Value%2A>是可以保存任何数据类型的值的字节数组。 | |&7; |指定该<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.PropertyItem.Value%2A>是数组的长时间签名 （32 位） 整数。 | |&10; |指定<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.PropertyItem.Value%2A>是对带符号长整数的数组。</xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.PropertyItem.Value%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.PropertyItem.Value%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.PropertyItem.Value%2A>

trans-unit.source: Each pair represents a fraction; the first integer is the numerator and the second integer is the denominator.| For more information about property tags, see "Image Property Tag Constants" in the MSDN library at http://msdn.microsoft.com/library.
trans-unit.target: 每个对表示的小数部分;第一个整数为分子，第二个整数为分母。 | 有关属性标记的详细信息，请参阅 http://msdn.microsoft.com/library 上 MSDN 库中的"映像的属性标记常量"。

trans-unit.source: An integer that defines the type of data contained in <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.PropertyItem.Value*>.
trans-unit.target: 一个整数，指定<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.PropertyItem.Value*>.</xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.PropertyItem.Value*>中包含的数据类型

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the value of the property item.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置属性项的值。

trans-unit.source: The byte array returned by the Value property contains data in one of several different primitive types.
trans-unit.target: 值属性返回的字节数组包含几种不同的基元类型之一中的数据。

trans-unit.source: To use the data, determine the data type using the <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.PropertyItem.Type%2A> property and convert the byte array accordingly.
trans-unit.target: 若要使用的数据，确定的数据类型使用<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.PropertyItem.Type%2A>属性并将转换的字节数组相应地。</xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.PropertyItem.Type%2A>

trans-unit.source: A byte array that represents the value of the property item.
trans-unit.target: 一个表示属性项的值的字节数组。
